actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize a program to alleviate situation problems at Quincy Bay and Broad and Triangle Lake areas, Ill.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to conduct a program to alleviate siltation problems on the Mississippi River at Quincy Bay and the Broad Lake and Triangle Lake areas, Illinois.

titles.title: A bill to authorize a program to alleviate situation problems at Quincy Bay and Broad and Triangle Lake areas, Ill.
